modShortDescription: Just wrote a mod to make it possible to craft every candy at the chemistry bench.
modDescription:
Just wrote a mod to make it possible to craft every [candy](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) at the chemistry bench.

There will be future updates soon! Check out for new version!

Alpha 19.5!

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ggw0f7elnau94ef/CraftableCandys.rar?dl=1)**

**Credits:** GermanLive
